ai_chat.title: AI Assistant
ai_chat.welcome_message: Hello! I'm your AI assistant. How can I help you today?

responses.how_to_order: To place an order, browse products, click 'Add to Cart' or 'Buy Now', select quantity, and proceed to checkout. You can pay via card, UPI, wallet, or cash on delivery.
responses.find_vendors: You can find vendors by clicking on the 'Vendors' tab in your dashboard. Use the map view to see vendors near you and contact them directly.
responses.dashboard_help: Your dashboard has three main sections: Products (browse items), Vendors (find sellers), and Orders (track purchases). Use the search and filters to find what you need.
responses.payment_help: We accept multiple payment methods: Credit/Debit cards, UPI, Digital wallets, and Cash on Delivery. All payments are secure and encrypted.
responses.vendor_features: As a vendor, you can list products, manage inventory, track sales, access analytics, and connect with customers. Switch to vendor mode to access these features.
responses.general_help: I can help you with orders, finding vendors, using the dashboard, payments, and general navigation. What would you like to know?

contact_vendor.title: Contact Vendor
contact_vendor.tip: üí° Tip: Respect their time, they're busy feeding the city.
